nodes.text: Eerm was a serpentine predator from Dorin.
It was also a common surname among Kel Dors.

This snake-like species has some unusual characteristic features: it has hair on the top of its head and it also has a double layer of skin, when the upper layer of skin is damaged, the lower layer is pushed up by muscles.  under the second layer of skin.  It does not have a known subspecies but it is known that some specimens develop mutations that prevent them from generating the second auxiliary layer of skin.
